tasks.instruction:
Develop a Carbon Stock Estimation Model that takes remote sensing data as input (NDVI, canopy cover, soil carbon data) and outputs carbon sequestration in tCO₂e per hectare. 

Requirements:
1. Create a machine learning model that can estimate carbon stock/sequestration
2. Input features: NDVI (Normalized Difference Vegetation Index), canopy cover percentage, soil carbon data
3. Output: Carbon sequestration in tCO₂e (tonnes of CO₂ equivalent) per hectare
4. Provide model training, validation, and prediction capabilities
5. Include data preprocessing, feature engineering if needed
6. Save the model and create a demonstration/testing interface
7. Provide model performance metrics and visualization of results

Save all outputs including the trained model, code, and documentation in the /workspace directory.
